article_title: Alberta premier Jason Kenney denies call for health minister's resignation over bullying allegations
article_description: Alberta Premier Jason Kenney brushed aside a call Friday from the NDP Opposition Leader for him to fire Health Minister Tyler Shandro over allegations he berated a Calgary doctor at his home and belittled citizens in emails
article_content: Alberta Premier Jason Kenney brushed aside a call Friday from the NDP Opposition Leader for him to fire Health Minister Tyler Shandro over allegations he berated a Calgary doctor at his home and belittled citizens in emails Kenney told reporters Shandro and   7467 chars
